  • Constructor Details

    • WorkflowUtils

      public WorkflowUtils()

  • Method Details

    • completeWorkflow

      public static boolean completeWorkflow(Workflow wf) throws WorkflowStateException
      Sets the state of the workflow to WorkflowState#TC_COMPLETED. The workflow must be TC_ACTIVE.
      Parameters:
      wf - Workflow
      Throws:
      WorkflowStateException - If the workflow is in an invalide state to be completed

    • suspendWorkflow

      public static boolean suspendWorkflow(Workflow wf) throws WorkflowStateException
      Suspends the workflow. The workflow must be TC_ACTIVE.
      Parameters:
      wf - Workflow
      Throws:
      WorkflowStateException - If the workflow is in an invalide state to be suspended

    • suspendAllActiveWorkflowsWithoutThrowing

      public static List<String> suspendAllActiveWorkflowsWithoutThrowing()
      Suspend all workflows

    • completeAllActiveWorkflowsWithoutThrowing

      public static List<String> completeAllActiveWorkflowsWithoutThrowing()
      Suspend all workflows

    • completeWorkflowWithoutThrowing

      public static boolean completeWorkflowWithoutThrowing(Workflow wf)

    • suspendWorkflowWithoutThrowing

      public static boolean suspendWorkflowWithoutThrowing(Workflow wf)

    • resumeAllWorkflows

      public static List<String> resumeAllWorkflows()
      Resumes all errorred and suspended workflows

    • resumeWorkflows

      public static List<String> resumeWorkflows(String workflowType, Date from, Date until, Boolean includeErrorWorkflows)
      Resumes suspended and optionally errorred workflows
      Parameters:
      workflowType - Type of workflow to resume
      from - Resume workflows started from date
      until - Resume workflows started until date
      includeErrorWorkflows - When true also resumes errorred workflows

    • resumeWorkflowWithoutThrowing

      public static boolean resumeWorkflowWithoutThrowing(Workflow wf)

    • resumeWorkflow

      public static boolean resumeWorkflow(Workflow wf) throws WorkflowStateException
      Resumes the workflow. The workflow engine will subsequently attempt to advance the workflow to its next step. If an error occurs again, the error will be logged and the workflow's state set to WorkflowState#TC_ERROR.
      Parameters:
      wf - Workflow
      Throws:
      WorkflowStateException - If the workflow is in an invalid state to be resumed

    • invokeTrigger

      public static boolean invokeTrigger(Workflow wf, WorkflowTriggerKey triggerKey) throws TriggerUnavailableException
      Invokes the triggerKey on the current step of the specified workflow causing the workflow to advance to the next step.
      Parameters:
      wf - Workflow whose trigger will be resumed
      triggerKey - A workflow trigger key off the current workflow
      Throws:
      TriggerUnavailableException - if trigger is unavailable

    • timeoutBranch

      public static boolean timeoutBranch(Workflow wf, String timeoutBranch) throws InvalidBranchTimeoutException
      Throws:
      InvalidBranchTimeoutException

    • timeoutBranchWithoutThrowing

      public static boolean timeoutBranchWithoutThrowing(Workflow wf, String timeoutBranch)

    • timeoutBranchOnAllWorkflows

      public static List<String> timeoutBranchOnAllWorkflows(String timeoutBranch)

    • invokeTriggerWithoutThrowingTriggerUnavailable

      public static boolean invokeTriggerWithoutThrowingTriggerUnavailable(Workflow wf, WorkflowTriggerKey triggerKey)

    • invokeTriggerOnAllWorkflows

      public static List<String> invokeTriggerOnAllWorkflows(WorkflowTriggerKey triggerKey)

    • logTraceMsg

      public static void logTraceMsg(String msg)
      Log a trace message to the service workflow category logger.
      Parameters:
      msg - the message to log
